content:
DAV Property URL Scheme - Namespace

  • “;DAV/” segment

    • The namespace to the right of the param is a path space. Right now the path has only one entry because the property namespace is flat but in the future we will want to extend it to hierarchical.
    • Thus one day a property would be referred to http://foo;DAV/a/b/c/d
